name: Castle Souls
description:
Castle Souls is the first game made by our team and also our first game jam, so don't be too harsh on us please.
Redesigned idea: Dark Soul's combat and exploring

Console: Playstation 1

Restrictions: Controller (number of buttons), resolution and game size (maximum 660 mb)

Using optional theme: No

Premade Assets: Player's Sprite: Loreon Knight Character by sanctumpixel
